author: Harish Gilai
title: Medical staff, family & friends help him overpower virus
description: Vizag man turns a source of inspiration for many in battle against coronavirus
content: On March 23, when 25-year old Vikram (name changed) from Tagarapuvalasa came to know that his throat and nasal swabs tested COVID-19 positive, he was shattered and went into a depression. He thought he was nearing his end and lying on the bed at an isolation … [+1768 chars]
